StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetShipperByContractID]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body: ( @ContractID int ) AS SELECT [SHIP_ID] ,[CONTRACT_ID] ,[SHIP_TYPE] ,[TRAINING_ORGANIZATION_ID] ,[SHIP_DATE] ,[DATEDUEHOME] ,[DEPARTUREDATE] ,[SPECIAL_RECOGNITION] ,[PAY_ENTRY_BASE_DATE] ,[RECRUITER_ASSISTANCE_RECOM] ,[PAY_GRADE_CODE] ,[PAY_GRADE_ED_DATE] ,[AFADBD] ,[CONFIRM_CONTRACT] ,[COMPONENT_CODE] FROM [mcriss].[dbo].[SHIPPER] WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE [CONTRACT_ID] = @ContractID
